CIPHER.0.cipherString: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: It is one of the truisms of politics that a conservative is often enough a former liberal who has been 'mugged by reality.'

CIPHER.6.cipherString: A highbrow is the kind of person who looks at a sausage and thinks of Picasso.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: I feel like I've finally made it as an actor. I've been doing this for years and you don't always make a movie that everybody likes.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: Don't ever rope me in as a late-night talk show host. I don't want to be one.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: A moral being is one who is capable of reflecting on his past actions and their motives - of approving of some and disapproving of others.
